alert.note: Alert for Bell; Falls (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 20 at 4:55PM CDT until April 20 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Bell County in central Texas... West central Falls County in central Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Troy, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lott around 540 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Pleasant Grove, Durango, Satin, Cego, Travis, Belfalls, Mooreville, Chilton, Cedar Springs and Tomlinson Hill. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 305 and 314. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
